item.title: Linux, Dmesg, and Issue Reporting
item.description: So started using linux.. Getting this issue here: [ 499.624767] thinkpad_acpi: unhandled HKEY event 0x6031 [ 499.624771] thinkpad_acpi: please report the conditions when this event happened to ibm-acpi-devel@lists.sourceforge.net [ 517.509897] thinkpad_acpi: unhandled HKEY event 0x6031 [ 517.509905] thinkpad_acpi: please report the conditions when this event happened to ibm-acpi-devel@lists.sourceforge.net I really don’t want to have to mail a mailing list and learn how to engage with the community, how to write a post, and worst yet, having to subscribe to a mailing list to get a single response.
